businesses.name: the wordmistress
businesses.business_details: I'm a copywriting veteran with many millions of words in my wake. I'm quick to grasp a brief, have a flair for translating technical jargon into lay-person lingo and I particularly enjoy working with clients looking for a long-term professional relationship.
businesses.product_details: Professionally written content gives you an edge over your competitors. In my 13+ years of copywriting, I've worked with a vast array of sectors and businesses of all sizes. I will write your website content, blog posts, magazine editorials, corporate bios, brochures, EDMs and anything else you need with polish and excellence.
businesses.headline: Marketing Copywriter
